stat_hdrc (rug)

Source: R/stat-hdr.R
stat_hdr.Rd

stat for hdr (rug)

stat_hdr(
  mapping = NULL,
  data = NULL,
  geom = "hdr_rug",
  position = "dodge2",
  ...,
  coef = 1.5,
  na.rm = FALSE,
  show.legend = NA,
  inherit.aes = TRUE
)

Arguments

mapping

Default: NULL
data

Default: NULL
geom

PARAM_DESCRIPTION, Default: 'hdr_boxplot'
position

PARAM_DESCRIPTION, Default: 'dodge2'
...

...
coef

Default: 1.5
na.rm

Default: FALSE
show.legend

Default: NA
inherit.aes

Default: TRUE
